body.name: CLEARALIF laundry Fabric Softener Sheets, Lavender Scent, 160 Loads, Eco Friendly, Great For Travel, Apartments, Dorms.

features: The agitation, spinning, and heat of the laundry process can damage clothes at the fiber level.Use clearalif laundry softener sheets to reduce damage caused by fiber friction,Enhance softness.
During daily use, clothes rub against each other and cause static electricity, CLEARALIF softener sheets combat static and soften fabrics.
Reduce harsh ingredients and use gentler bioenzyme-based materials for lower sensitivity.
Easier to use than traditional fabric softener , with no need for measuring and no mess.
No plastic pollution, rapid dissolution, and no residue.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enhance fragrance and softness The agitation, spinning, and heat of the laundry process can damage clothes at the fiber level.Use clearalif laundry softener sheets to reduce damage caused by fiber friction,Enhance softness. Antistatic Property During daily use, clothes rub against each other and cause static electricity, CLEARALIF softener sheets combat static and soften fabrics.

Fabric FIber Damage Protect Reduce fiber friction to reduce fiber damage and protect fiber color. Keep your clothes bright and colorful. Fight Static Electricity Fabric softener sheets combat static and soften fabrics.

Travel laundry set Convenient for travel and compact in size, taking up minimal space in your luggage. No need for measuring No need to measure the dosage as it comes pre-cut. The laundry set is designed to provide up to 160 loads. No plastic pollution Utilize more green packaging materials and bioenzyme cleaning agents. A good gift idea It is a perfect gift that adds creativity to a green lifestyle.

Why choose CLEARALIF laundry sheets? Developing green and useful products is what we are going after. Plastic and chemical pollution are serious problems that concern us all.We use green ingredients such as surfactants and enzymes to prevent chemical pollution.We employ decomposable packaging to combat plastic consumption.With compression technology, we removed the liquid in our products and made them more portable, which enables us to simplify packaging. Therefore, we can transport more goods at one time to save fuel and reduce carbon emission.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use, leaves my clothes soft!
reviews.reviewText: These are fantastic! They have a light scent and do not leave any residue on my clothes. They come in one large sheet that is actually two small sheets with a tear line on each. They are super easy to use and measure. The sheets are thick and feel almost papery but dissolve easily with water. My clothes have most definitely felt noticeably softer since adding these into my laundry routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These work ok
reviews.reviewText: I try to use a bit more than I think I need to. They dissolve well and work ok. I would like for them to have a stronger smell. If you like something that is almost unscented, then these are for you. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love that these are more eco conscious and dont include any plastic in the product packaging. The scent is really nice and makes my clothes smell great. It is super easy to grab a sheet and just throw it in with my laundry. I like that I know exactly how many loads i have left i can do so i know when to place a new order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Who would have thought
reviews.reviewText: I really don't like lugging jugs of detergent let alone a jug of fabric softner to the laundry room and trying to juggle it all carrying my laundry basket. To be honest it's just me but I don't even like using liquid fabric softener don't ask me why maybe it's the additional step or never felt I needed to. I ran across the CLEARALIF laundry Fabric Softener Sheets, Lavender Scent and I already have changed to laundry detergent sheets as my preferred form of detergent. I find though that detergent sheets don't leave your clothes with any detectable scent no matter what brand I've tried. So after reading the fabric softener sheets reduce static, soften fabrics, AND leave clothes scented I decided to give them a whirl.I can't say I really expected very much being laundry detergent sheets leave no scent even if they clean my clothes extremely well. I used two sheets for a larger more soiled load of clothes. I tossed them in the dryer along with my wool dryer balls. Taking the clothes out later indeed the fabrics felt really soft. I even have a pair of normally scratchy ribbed texture boxer briefs and even THEY felt way better than I've ever seen. The sheets actually improved the texture so I guess I won't be so hesitant to wear them saving them as my last resort pair until laundry day.I notice the slight lavender scent but it is really light. For me I do wish it was a little more intense as I like lavender's smell. As for wrinkle free welllll for the most part in conjunction with using wool dryer balls yes my clothes were a little less wrinkled but not perfectly wrinkle free I won't make like there weren't areas on my shirts here and there. Overall even the condition of my clothes was a noticeable improvement.I'm very pleased now how my clothes feel and less static using these and ease of use in general. Makes my job a lot simpler and less hassle. I'd even order these again even if they don't necessarily give off as much scent as I'd like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We are super excited to have these for traveling. We do months on the road and this product will be amazing given our limited storage space. We tried the Clearalif Softener sheets at home and found them to work great on an average size load of clothes. We did not find the scent to be very close to lavender, just our opinion. It's more of a generic fresh scent which is soft and not offensive, just not super like lavender. This did not diminish the experience - we'd rather it work and be convenient and it checks those boxes for us. Given the convenient and effectiveness of this product we still consider it 5 star quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as significant as I had hoped
reviews.reviewText: I was hoping for a more lingering scent and significantly softer clothing than without using anything. I usually use strongly-scented liquids including liquid fabric softener. While these break down nicely in water, I really don’t feel like there was any added benefit aside from stackable storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First time using a fabric softener
reviews.reviewText: Never used fabric softener in my laundry, but then again, I'm a guy. Good excuse, right?These were interesting to try. These are dissolving sheets that you throw into your laundry along with detergent. I used one sheet on a fairly large load.By the time my clothes were dry, I put my nose to my clothes and sure enough, they had a nice, fresh scent that was noticeable without being overpowering. And, I would also conclude that they did feel softer than usual.So, hats off to these fabric softener sheets for not only working as advertised but for being so easy to use. Just throw a sheet in your washing machine and you're set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars More Environmentally Friendly Option
reviews.reviewText: I didn't notice any major differences when using these compared to not. It didn't really boost the scent much and doesn't scream lavender to me. My clothes didn't seem much softer than usual. I did not have any static issues with my laundry, but that is normal for me even without these softener sheets. Though there's not any huge noticable difference I hope the sheets are improving the quality of the laundry at a level I can't see and protecting the fibers and everyone like claimed. I really appreciate the eco friendly design and the convenience that these sheets have. No bulky bottle to store, less plastic usage, easy to use without pouring or measuring, small and light which is nice for taking on the go.
